gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
TO-INF
or
REPORT VB

sense.def:
To resolve to do something
pomeni trdno se odločiti, da bomo nekaj naredili.

seg.quote: I resolved to tell the truth.
He had already resolved that Kitchener should be appointed.

sense.def:
Resolve
je trden sklep, da bomo nekaj naredili.

seg.quote: We must be firm in our resolve to oppose them.

sense.def:
To resolve a problem, argument, or difficulty
pomeni najti rešitev za težavo, nesporazum ali zaplet.

seg.quote: The Cabinet met to resolve the crisis.
